pr_title: Add support directives to inline fragments

timeline.message:
Add support directives to inline fragments

- Address issue with directives with inline fragments
- Simplify and unify code generation for  regular fragments and inline fragments
- Address issue with fragment serialization in `ResponseWriter`

Closes https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/1883
Remove unused `FragmentResponseFieldMapper` + fix regular fragment serialization / deserialization codegen

timeline.author: tasomaniac
